text: Terry Goodkind (January 11, 1948 - September 17, 2020) was an American writer from the U.S. state of Nebraska. He was known for writing fantasy books. His most famous book is called Wizard's First Rule which is part of the The Sword of Truth series. He was born in Omaha, Nebraska. Goodkind died on September 17, 2020 in Boulder City, Nevada at the age of 72.Terry Goodkind Dead: ‘The Sword of Truth’ Writer Dies at 72 ==References== Category:Writers from Omaha, Nebraska Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American novelists Category:People with dyslexia
title: Terry Goodkind
